settings_page.import_modal_text_t:
This operation will delete all previous promtps and categories before.
This operation is definitive.
settings_page.import_error_format_global_t: Invalid data format: expecting an object with prompts and categories arrays.
settings_page.import_error_format_arrays_t: Invalid data format: prompts and categories must be arrays.
settings_page.import_error_format_prompts_t: Invalid data format: each prompt must have name, description, text and category properties of type string.
settings_page.erase_warning_t: Warning : This action will permanently delete all the categories and prompts!

prompt_page.text_p:
Your prompt here.
Use curly brackets {'{{ }}'} to denote a parameter.
Ex: My name is {'{{name}}'}. I am {'{{adjective}}'}.
prompt_page.check_error_text_t: The prompt text must not be empty.
prompt_page.check_error_name_t: The prompt name must not be empty.

category_page.check_error_name_t: The category name must not be empty.
